group_1.textRight: I don't know the specifics of how it was granted,@though.

group_1.textLeft: Then...let me test it out on you first...

group_1.narration: [textBlack:"Ugh...?!"]
[textBlack:Is Kyubey's endless well of memories flooding into me...?]

[textBlack:Yuu already explained the relationship]@[textBlack:between Magical Girls and Witches to me earlier.]@[textBlack:Energy needed to sustain the universe is collected]@[textBlack:when a Magical Girl turns into a Witch.]

[textBlack:In this universe, however,]@[textBlack:Doppels are the mechanism for that, ]@[textBlack:as there's an Automatic Purification System ]@[textBlack:that cleanses Magical Girls of impurities...]
[textBlack:All that's stored in Kyubey@is the truth about Magical Girls...]
[textBlack:Still, this is a ludicrous amount of knowledge.]@[textBlack:Prying too deeply could be dangerous...]
[textBlack:...There's more?]
[textBlack:I'm getting the memories and emotions of other ]@[textBlack:Magical Girls that Kyubey has made contracts with...!]
[textBlack:Kuroe-san...@Tamaki Iroha...@Momoe Nagisa...]
[textBlack:And a memory from...]
This is...a hospital...?
A baby...?
―???―@Please, Kyubey...
―???―@At this rate, everyone in the hospital,@including me and my baby, is going to die to this Witch.
―???―@Let me make a contract and become a Magical Girl...!
―Kyubey―@You're past the suitable mental age for that.
―Kyubey―@Your low qualifications mean that@even if you do become a Magical Girl,@you won't be able to defeat the Witch anyway, you know?
―???―@Still, if there's even the tiniest chance@that my baby will survive...
―Kyubey―@...Alright.@So, what is your wish?
―???―@My wish is...
―???―@"For my daughter to become somebody@who understands the pain and suffering of others."
―???―@I've hurt people too many times@because I just didn't get it...
―???―@I'm so sorry, Shiyui...
―???―@Don't be like Mama...
―???―@Kyubey.
―???―@Thank you for letting me give my little one a future.
"It seems like your magic lets you synchronize@your memories with those of your target."
"What did you see?"

group_1.textCenter: And then...memories of when my mother made@her contract...
She...made her wish for my sake...
I'm going to start heading down the wrong path...
...but I'm glad that I got to learn this before then.

group_1.textRight: It took me a while to shake off Nagisa-chan.
...Mm? Did you become a Magical Girl? Looks like@you found something to wish for!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I finally made up my mind.
...you and I can live our lives together as@Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: You can get rid of even more bad guys like this,@right?

group_1.textLeft: Will you continue to sin with me?

group_1.textRight: Of course! You're a good girl, so I'll help you with@anything you want, you know?
To be honest, I'd like to go lend a hand to@Kuroe-chan and her friend, but...
Nagisa-chan might catch me if I do.
What a pain, what a pain...

group_1.textLeft: You're the one ray of hope in my life.
I've changed thanks to what you've given me.
Hearing you call me by my name...
...is what gave me my own free will.

group_1.textRight: Mm-hm, yeah. I love you too, Shii,@you know that?

group_1.textLeft: No matter how cursed the path ahead of us gets...
...I'll never make you go it alone...

group_1.textRight: I hate being lonely, too, so I really hope we can@stay together.

group_1.textLeft: Show me more of your face.
Teach me more about yourself...@your love—

group_1.textRight: Did— did something happen just now?@Maybe not?
